data.eml:eml: New and little-known species of isopods (Crustacea, Isopoda) from the eastern Mediterranean

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Castelló, José (2017): New and little-known species of isopods (Crustacea, Isopoda) from the eastern Mediterranean. Zootaxa 4311 (2): 151-182, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4311.2.1
